alert.note: Alert for Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Simpson County through 515 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mendenhall, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pinola around 455 PM CDT. Harrisville around 510 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include D`Lo and Braxton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
